Name: Each Other
About the game: Each Other is a new top-down puzzle game solo in pixel art. Through four chapters composed of 15 levels each, the player controls Edwin and Judy, 2 characters responding at the same time to the same controls. The goal is to bring them to the two exits (hatches), while avoiding the different obstacles (holes, enemies, etc...), in order to pass to the next level. Throughout the chapters you'll follow their story while they move through the different floors of their orphanage.
